name: Protec the City
description:
Made in a week-end during Nordic Game Jam, Copenhagen in April 2018

The theme was "Breaking Point"

My original idea was to make a physics-based game in which you pile up stuff until breaking point, in Construct 2

I ended up spending half of the jam developing the physic features I needed for my idea, and I spent the rest of the time trying to turn the result into a game :D

----------

PROTECT THE CITY

Left/right arrow : Move

Catch the guns and return them against the alien

Don't drop them or they will destroy the city !
